title: 108_s2178
content: The Act titled "National Park System Laws Technical Amendments Act of 2004" amends the Lackawanna Valley National Heritage Area Act of 2000 to grant authorities to the management entity for preparing and implementing the management plan. It also includes provisions for Hawaii Volcanoes National Park. The Act amends the Hawaii Volcanoes National Park section by correcting the spelling to "Hawai'i Volcanoes". It also amends the "I HAVE A DREAM" plaque at Lincoln Memorial section by correcting "expand" to "expend" contributions. Additionally, it addresses wild and scenic rivers. Section 3(a) of the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act is amended to redesignate and designate various paragraphs, including those related to White Clay Creek, Wekiva River, Wildhorse and Kiger Creeks, Lower Delaware River, and Rivers of Caribbean National Forest. Additionally, Rosie the Riveter/World War II Home Front National Historical Park is established. The Rosie the Riveter/World War II Home Front National Historical Park Establishment Act of 2000 is amended to correct numbering and details related to various historical sites within the park. The Rosie the Riveter/World War II Home Front National Historical Park Establishment Act of 2000 is amended to update historical sites within the park, including the Vicksburg Campaign Trail Battlefields. SEC. 8. HARRIET TUBMAN SPECIAL RESOURCE STUDY. Amends the Harriet Tubman Special Resource Study Act by updating references to other laws. SEC. 9. PUBLIC LAND MANAGEMENT AGENCY FOUNDATIONS. Addresses the establishment of foundations to raise private sector funds for Federal land management. Private sector funds can be raised by establishing foundations for Federal land management agencies, qualifying for General Service Administration contract airfares. SEC. 10 amends the National Park Service Organic Act and the National Park System General Authorities Act to include short titles. SEC. 11 addresses park police indemnification. SEC. 12 amends the Boston Harbor Islands National Recreation Area. SEC. 13 modifies the National Historic Preservation Act. SEC. 14 revises the National Trails System Act. SEC. 14 of the National Trails System Act is amended to correct typos and designate paragraphs for specific trails. SEC. 15. Vicksburg National Military Park boundary modification. SEC. 16. Allegheny Portage Railroad National Historic Site boundary revision. SEC. 17. Tallgrass Prairie National Preserve amendment. The curr_chunk is about the roles of the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the Vice President of the United States as President of the Senate.
